Summary: Link moved to additional evidence section
trends: There has been one other sighting in Judson
There were no other sightings in Judson on or around May 26th 2011
divs: sighting detailsjust typical behavior of the entities\ufos i've filmed for the last six months. i had up to 15 around me, at a given time-very close. i am editing that video for youtube. some months back, your director called authorities on me, for sending in videos, or at least his email confirms that. his name was "dm". i am wondering why he would do that, since i am only trying to solve the ufo mystery as are you. since then i have been stopped numerous times by authorities while filming, and am not confortable taping unless taping in a secluded spot. one time i felt my life was threatened by authorities, and they threatened to confiscate my equipment. i am afraid mufons calls to authorities have caused me distress. my videos are all real. it saddens me to think reporting a ufo to mufon, can result in getting in trouble with authorities who are seeing the same anomalies. very sad. please do not call the cops again, as they have been letting me be for a bit. thank you. ufozmankato. [[link moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg] this is a brief portion of last night. i an another witnessed 41 ufos, in one hour on 5\26\11 and videotaped a potion of them, soon to be on youtube. thank you. ufozmankato
